amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike title III of the bill which deals with high-cost mortgages.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 9 printed in House Report 111-98 to strike title III from the bill relating to high-cost mortgages.

vote.text: On agreeing to the McHenry amendment (A009) Failed by recorded vote: 171 - 255 (Roll no. 241).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A009) offered by Mr. McHenry.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the McHenry amendment (A009) Failed by recorded vote: 171 - 255 (Roll no. 241).
